mapper.select: SELECT A.NORMS_CODE AS normsCode ,A.NORMS_OUT AS normsName ,A.NORMS_SUTTLE AS normsSuttle ,A.NORMS_ERROR AS normsError ,A.NORMS_NUMBER AS normsNumber ,A.NORMS_SIZE AS normsSize ,A.NORMS_TEXTURE AS normsTexture ,A.NORMS_OUT AS normsOut ,A.NORMS_KG AS normsKg ,A.NORMS_OUT_SIZE AS normsOutSize ,A.NORMS_OUT_TEXTURE AS normsOutTexture FROM PD_NORMS_STD AS A WHERE A.STANDARD_ID = (SELECT B.STANDARD_ID FROM PD_STANDARD B WHERE B.CLASSES_CODE = #{filterMap.classesCode} AND B.MACHINING_CODE = #{filterMap.machiningCode} AND B.BREED_CODE = #{filterMap.breedCode} AND B.FEATURE_CODE = #{filterMap.featureCode} AND B.WEIGHT_CODE = #{filterMap.weightCode})
